JobFullDesc:
uShip is seeking a talented individual to join our Agility team as a full-time Senior Scrum Master. The uShip Agility Team is a part of the Engineering department, which is charged with helping to maintain, build and grow the uShip website and marketplace.  If you are a motivated and driven individual who understands servant leadership and wants to work in an energetic and entrepreneurial environment with outstanding career and growth opportunities, then this is the opportunity for you!

RESPONSIBILITIES


Servant leadership of our delivery teams 
Facilitating Scrum ceremonies and team meetings
Facilitate quarterly / strategic planning sessions and workshops
Coaching individuals and teams on Agile best practices
Removing impediments as quickly as possible
Resolving conflict to empower collaboration and self-sufficiency 
Protecting team(s) from negative influences
Tracking and evaluating team productivity AND health to make sure teams are setup for success
Working with Product Managers and Stakeholders to provide clear priorities that drive towards organizational goals while maximizing ROI
Working with Engineering Managers to identify and manage risks and dependencies associated with projects to ensure realistic expectations are set
Actively learns about uShip’s products and services
Continuing to learn and adopt Agile practices to grow and improve uShip’s success

REQUIREMENTS


Skilled servant leader
Great active listener
Possess strong written and oral communication skills
Awesome facilitator
Highly self-motivated and disciplined
Extremely detail oriented
Possess a high level of emotional intelligence
The drive to grow, learn 
Strong SDLC (software development life cycle) experience
Experience with quarterly / longterm planning or scaling frameworks
5+ years with Agile/Scrum development processes
5+ years of experience as a Scrum Master
Internet savvy and well versed in running or using transaction based internet sites
Ability to understand technical issues at a high level
Experience building solid working relationships with team members, leadership and stakeholders

WHY USHIP?uShip offers big-company benefits in a small-ish sized company because we really value and are committed to our people. There are even some extras that will surprise you.


100% Paid Health and Dental available
401(k) matching with no vesting
Stock Options
100% paid maternity and paternity leave
uShip shipping credit ($750)
Pet Insurance
Monthly Wellness Reimbursements
Casual dress code
Dog-friendly 
So much more!
